name: Bing to Yandex
description: Bing to Yandex combined with Edge deflector (https://github.com/da2x/EdgeDeflector) lets you search through cortana tool bar with Yandex instead of Bing. Based on Bing to Google by Louis Grasset
author: Ruslan Livansky (info@livansky.ru) feat. Louis Grasset <hello@louisgrasset.fr> (louisgrasset.fr)
